Title: Children of Earth, Day One
Plot: At 8.45am, every child in the world suddenly stops, chanting the words "we are coming" again and again. Whilst investigating, the remaining Torchwood team face greater personal and professional challenges than ever before, having to work with their numbers depleted.
GuestStars: Kai Owen, Peter Capaldi, Paul Copley, Nicholas Farrell, Susan Brown, Lucy Cohu, Cush Jumbo, Liz May Brice, Ian Gelder, Colin McFarlane, Deborah Findlay, Nicholas Briggs, Patric Naiambana, Tom Price, Charles Abomeli
